definition: exaggerated nasality in speech, found in some regional dialects, pronounce with a nasal twang
details:
noun
- exaggerated nasality in speech, found in some regional dialects
= example: exaggerated nasality in speech, found in some regional dialects
= synonyms: nasal twang
- a sharp vibrating sound (as of a plucked string)
verb
- pronounce with a nasal twang
- pluck, usually strings of an instrument
= example: pluck, usually strings of an instrument
- twitch or throb with pain
- sound with a twang
= example: sound with a twang
- to cause a strong ringing sound
= example: to cause a strong ringing sound
